metadata.title: CVE-2017-7601 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
LibTIFF 4.0.7 has a "shift exponent too large for 64-bit type long"undefined behavior issue, which might allow remote attackers to cause adenial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8').
